reviews.text: Staff really friendly and helpful...We only had minutes to spare to get our train to Conwy but staff made sure we got our tickets, they got us to the correct platform and held the train for us as we ran down the stairs. The staff here are fantastic
A very big, beautiful, old station with great services to the rest of England, Scotland and Wales

Unhelpful ticket office, unhelpful customer service team. Machine won't print my ticket and apparently that's down to me despite the fact they immediately take machine out of service. Bunch of crooks. Made me miss my train and have to wait for an hour for next train. Disgusting service from Transport for Wales and Chester train station.
Can't fault this station,places to get snacks etc and a pub just over the road, staff helpful, fairly clean,I actually saw a station worker tell someone to pick up their litter! Brilliant.
Well signed and clean and tidy.
